name: bigeyex.brackets-sftp-upload
title: SFtpUpload
description:
Upload changed files in your project to a server via SFTP(SCP)/FTP, you have total control over which to upload through the changed files panel.
Contributors: danielkratz, mhentgesarrow, dedo1911, swengmatt, M1szelek, dennistobar, zarnivoop
author: Wang Yu <bigeyex@gmail.com> (http://www.mit.edu/~wangyu/)
